feed.title: Google Cloud: Organization Policy Service
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Organization Policy Service

entry.content: You can use custom constraints with Organization Policy to provide more granular control over specific fields for some Datastream resources. For more information, see Manage Application Integration resources using custom constraints. This feature is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Organization Policy now supports custom constraints for more granular control over specific Datastream resource fields. This generally available feature enhances resource management.
entry.title: Feature: New granular controls for Datastream resources

entry.content: You can use custom constraints with Organization Policy to provide more granular control over specific fields for some Application Integration resources. For more information, see Manage Application Integration resources using custom constraints. This feature is available in Preview.
entry.summary: Organization Policy now supports custom constraints for Application Integration, offering finer control over resources. This feature is currently in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: New controls for Application Integration

entry.content: You can use custom constraints with Organization Policy to provide more granular control over specific fields for some Dataform resources. For more information, see Create custom organization policy constraints. This feature is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Organization Policy now supports custom constraints for Dataform resources, offering more granular control over specific fields. This generally available feature enhances resource management.
entry.title: Feature: New granular control for Dataform resources

entry.content:
Select Workload Identity Federation resources let you use custom constraints to define your own restrictions on Google Cloud services. To learn which Workload Identity Federation resources support custom constraints and to view sample use cases, see Use custom organization policies for Workload Identity Federation.

This feature is available in General Availability.
entry.summary: You can now use custom constraints to define your own restrictions on Google Cloud services for Workload Identity Federation resources. This feature is in General Availability.
entry.title: Feature: Workload Identity Federation Now Supports Custom Constraints
